translation: The great chariot-warriors will think that you have withdrawn from the battle out of fear, and you will be held in low esteem by those who have held you in high regard.
commentary: 2.35 fear from fear? from the battle? Uparatam withdrawn? Mansyante will think? You thee? Maharathah the great carwarriors? whose of whom? f and? You thou? Majority much thought of? being having been? Will you go will receive? Laghavam lightness.Commentary Duryodhana and others will certainly think that you have fled from the battle from fear of Karna and others? but not through compassion and reverence
